title: New York City Councilman Faces Suspension Over Alleged Harassment, Virgin Islands Trip
text:
New York City Councilman Andy King should be suspended without pay for allegedly violating the council’s anti-harassment policy and misusing council funds to pay for a staff retreat to the U.S. Virgin Islands, the council’s ethics committee said Wednesday.

The standards and ethics committee laid out the allegations in a report that also accused Mr. King of retaliating against staff who complained about harassment. The report said the 2017 trip to the Virgin Islands coincided with the wedding there of the daughter of Mr. King’s...
